pr_title: EQL: Replace EqlSearchResponse.Hits parser with ObjectParser

timeline.message:
EQL: Replace EqlSearchResponse.Hits parser with ObjectParser

Replaces the existing hand-build Hits parser with a
ConstructingObjectParser version.

Relates to #49581

timeline.bodyText: I didn't implement this path since it existed in the original parser only for backward compatibility with the older version hits total and shouldn't occur in this version.
timeline.author: imotov
